title: Password change
body:
may I please have my old password back? I was fiddling with it and I accidentally changed it, I find it so much harder to type it fast and easily, the password create now forced me to swap all my letters around for it to work, this feels extremely uncomfortable for me. Would it be possible to have it reset to the original password? The password I have been using for nearly one year, without anyone coming anywhere near close to guessing. Having to swap the letters around for it to work is really annoying and uncomfortable, took me about 10 tries to actually get it right (I swear I had it right and it just didn't want to accept) with this new letter switched password, from never getting it wrong... I'm just too used to typing everything fast in short time in a certain order, if you can revert it can you plz revert it? 

I really don't want to sit there for 2 min trying to type out my password

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=tVuZZyi1,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-03T12:17:10.528+0000)
>
> may I please have my old password back? I was fiddling with it and I accidentally changed it, I find it so much harder to type it fast and easily, the password create now forced me to swap all my letters around for it to work, this feels extremely uncomfortable for me. Would it be possible to have it reset to the original password? The password I have been using for nearly one year, without anyone coming anywhere near close to guessing. Having to swap the letters around for it to work is really annoying and uncomfortable, took me about 10 tries to actually get it right (I swear I had it right and it just didn't want to accept) with this new letter switched password, from never getting it wrong... I'm just too used to typing everything fast in short time in a certain order, if you can revert it can you plz revert it? 
> 
> I really don't want to sit there for 2 min trying to type out my password

Plz don't hack my accounts

Can't you just change your password again? Or does it tell you that you can't use a password you previously used?

What I would suggest is to make your password something completely different, so your muscle memory doesn't kick in when you go to type it. Think of it as a 'new' password that you can naturally type. It will take some getting used to, though.
tried changing back, it wont let me. So I made a new 1, and I just cant be bothered to learn it. So like the responsible person I am... I made a macro for it

Much responsibility very hard to hack wow.

Well, if your account gets hacked then um... don't say I didn't warn you, lol.

nah I hid it deep deep deep in my comp, with a messed up pattern encryption, and after you bypass the encryption you need to hit 6 keys in order to activate it (shorter and easier than the 12 the password needs).
Oh. That sorta sounds like the Enigma. Well done.
